4.4 In case buying goods duplicated with family persons
6. 168gadgtet shop reserves the right for exchanging goods  following policies and conditions of 168gadgtet shop only.
Customers can exchange goods in the following cases:
100 inches : 2.33 * 2.13 meters
4.6 In case of buying goods, more than 7 business days
4.1 In case customers are not satisfied with the products and want to exchange goods across models.
4.3 In case buying but don't know how to use it.
5.1 If in case they are exchanging goods following 2.1-2.4, 168gadgtet shop will send an employee to get returned goods and send the correct goods to customers without expenses. (If it's outside the return area, customers must deliver goods to the 168gadgtet shop by themselves, and 168gadgtet shop will be responsible for refunding following expenses incurred from the actual receipt.).
5.3 Period for processing in the examining step until exchanging or repairing goods will be approximately 15-30 business days.
